name: We are all locked
description:
Game about boring life in house.Your goal is to survive in boring house as long as possible. You do that by clicking things you are interested, yellow burst will show you in which thing you are interested the most at the time (its changing every few days, like for all of us).  The most interested thing is restoring more Sanity than others so you need less clicks.

Music is "Winds of Stories" by HorrorPen https://opengameart.org/content/winds-of-stories

I made it in one day, because of some problems. Have fun and stay safe!
